sentences.en: And, most importantly to the skeptic, Jesus did all this in history.
sentences.cn: 而，最能取信于怀疑者的一点是，耶稣确实在历史上做过这些事情。

sentences.en: How am I going to convince this skeptic that she should attention to my research?
sentences.cn: 我将如何使怀疑论者确信他要关注我的研究 呢 ?

sentences.en: I agree with the skeptic at this point : the change of calendar is an arbitrary conventionalism.
sentences.cn: 我和 无神论 者们一样,认为更换日历是一种专制的传统.

sentences.en: She is a skeptic about the dangers of global warming.
sentences.cn: 她是全球变暖危险的怀疑论者.

sentences.en: The slender skeptic skips school in slack seasons, which signifies her slackness.
sentences.cn: 一到淡季那个苗条的怀疑者就逃学, 这表现了她的懒散.
